metaTip Upgrade to v1.2

28
Dec0
Hot:

 

Time for an upgrade

 

 

Upon monitoring those I had the honor of helping setup their new metaTip Jars, I noticed a small, but annoying bug when tip jars first were created.  It seems that the control panel did not probably pass the API key (an important bit of information) to the tip jars, while it may seem small and utterly insignificant, it caused a mess of trouble in the back end.  Well, in 1.2 it’s fixed.  New users should automatically have their API key updated and even if they do not have a registered account with Sublime Geek yet.  No worries.

Also, being the fact that I don’t believe in boring fixes without adding a couple usability functions, I cleaned up the dialogs and also aimed at providing a little more documentation in assisting in new-comers.  I included a “Quick Setup” notecard in the v1.2 package which is really taken directly from the manual online; however, I included the link in that notecard to assist those who require more help than that of the quick setup.

Ok, now I didn’t like the way the color setup was working so I wanted to provide users with some color choices.  Now you can choose from a wide selection of preset colors to even inputting your own custom color.  Woot for choices!

Furthermore, I updated some boring backend stuff that no one really cares about.  For now, I’ll be monitoring usage as always and keep an eye out for oddities.
